body_html:
We're trying to move to the dataset API which doesn't have these freezing issues. Typically it's either some racing condition or the eval queue not being started.

@nealwu @mrry @tfboyd do we have plans to convert our examples with the new API? I think that would remove a lot of confusion.
body_text:
We're trying to move to the dataset API which doesn't have these freezing issues. Typically it's either some racing condition or the eval queue not being started.
@nealwu @mrry @tfboyd do we have plans to convert our examples with the new API? I think that would remove a lot of confusion.
body:
We're trying to move to the `dataset` API which doesn't have these freezing issues. Typically it's either some racing condition or the eval queue not being started.

@nealwu @mrry @tfboyd do we have plans to convert our examples with the new API? I think that would remove a lot of confusion.
